ordersText.title: SLAVE RAID
ordersText.general: If you rolled at least 2 [B] during this orbital strike, gain 1 reinforcement token. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: MALEVOLENCE MADE FLESH
ordersText.general: After you resolve this order, you may either spend 1 reinforcement token to place 1 free Kabalite Warrior on any friendly world or replace 1 Kabalite Warrior in the active system with 1 free Wych. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: WEB OF TORMENT
ordersText.general: While resolving this order, you may move your units from any number of systems adjacent to the active system. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: POWER FROM PAIN
ordersText.general: While resolving this order, increase your command level by 1. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: ECLIPSING DESCENT
ordersText.general: Enemy bastions do not prevent this orbital strike. During this orbital strike, you may spend 1 [B] to move 1 of your ships in the active system to another void in the active system. This can start a new combat after resolving this orbital strike. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

eventsText.title: REALSPACE RAID
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* Instead of revealing an order during the Operations Phase, you may discard this card to choose an uncontrolled world. Gain assets from this world and gain materiel equal to its materiel value.

eventsText.title: SHADOWFIELD PROJECTION
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* While resolving an Advance Order, you may discard this card to perform its steps in any order.

eventsText.title: REVEL IN BLOODSHED
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* At the end of an execution round of combat, you may discard this card and destroy 1 of your command level 1 or command level 2 units to move any number of your units to an adjacent area. This can start a new combat after resolving this combat.

eventsText.title: VISIONS OF COMMORRAGH
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* Instead of placing an order during the Planning Phase, you may discard this card.

eventsText.title: SLAVE TRADE
eventsText.general: Either spend up to 2 materiel to gain 1 asset of your choice for each materiel you spend or spend up to 2 assets to gain 2 materiel for each asset you spend.

eventsText.title: GRISLY TROPHIES
eventsText.general: Destroy 1 of your units on any world. Gain materiel equal to its materiel cost and gain reinforcement tokens equal to its morale value.

eventsText.title: SPECTACLE OF MURDER
eventsText.general: Purchase 1 combat upgrade. You may spend reinforcement tokens to reduce its materiel cost by 2 for each token you spend.

eventsText.title: BLACK HEART SPONSORING
eventsText.general: Either place 1 free Frigate on a friendly void or spend 2 materiel and 1 forge token to replace 1 Frigate with 1 free Dying Sun Battleship.

combatText.title: PREY ON THE WEAK
combatText.general: Either gain 1 [B] or spend 1 of your dice to rally 1 of your units.

combatText.title: AGENTS OF VECT
combatText.general: Gain 1 [S]. *newpara* If you have at least 1 unrouted ship in the active system, gain 1 reinforcement token and force your opponent to discard 1 of his reinforcement tokens.
combatText.unit: Kabalite Warrior: Place 1 of your reinforcement tokens in this area.

combatText.title: HUNT FROM THE SHADOWS
combatText.unit: Kabalite Warrior/Frigate: Your opponent may retreat 1 of his units. If he does not, gain 1 (B) for each unrouted Kabalite Warrior or Frigate. *newpara* Discard this card to retreat 1 of your units.

combatText.title: FUELLED BY HATRED
combatText.unit: Kabalite Warrior/Wych/Frigate: Gain 1 (S). *newpara* Your opponent rerolls 1 die of your choice.

combatText.title: WINGED STRIKE
combatText.general: Either gain 1 (B) or draw 1 combat card.
combatText.unit: Wych/Frigate: Either gain 2 (S) or play 1 combat card from your hand. Do not resolve its abilities, but gain its combat icons during this combat.

combatText.title: ECSTATIC CARNAGE
combatText.unit: Wych/Frigate: Spend 1 of your dice to gain either 1 [B] and 1 (S) or 1 [S] and 1 (B).

combatText.title: RAIDER TACTICS
combatText.general: If you are attacking, gain 2 (B). When your unit is destroyed during this execution round, you may retreat that unit instead. *newpara* If you are defending, gain 2 (S). When an enemy unit is routed during this execution round, it is destroyed unless your opponent spends 1 [M].

combatText.title: FIRE AND FADE
combatText.unit: Kabalite Warrior/Frigate: Your opponent may retreat 1 of his units. Then you may move 1 of your units to an adjacent friendly or uncontrolled area. If you do, gain either 1 [M] or 2 (B).

combatText.title: NEVER STATIONARY
combatText.general: If you are attacking, your opponent cannot gain (B) during this execution round. *newpara* If you are defending, gain 1 [S] and your opponent loses 2 (B).
combatText.unit: Wych/Frigate: Spend 1 [M] to place 1 free reinforcement token in this area.

combatText.title: CRUCIBLE OF MALEDICTION
combatText.general: Force your opponent to lose 1 [M]. *newpara* During this combat, your opponent cannot gain or spend [M].

combatText.title: HARROWING EMBRACE
combatText.general: Your opponent may retreat 1 of his units. If he does not, force your opponent to lose either 1 [B] or 1 [M].
combatText.unit: Ravager/Dying Sun: If you have fewer [M] than your opponent, your opponent loses 1 [M]. Otherwise, gain 2 (B) and 1 (S).

combatText.title: PICK THEM APART
combatText.general: Your opponent may retreat 1 of his units. If he does not, force your opponent to lose either 1 [S] or 1 [M].
combatText.unit: Ravager/Dying Sun: Gain 1 (B) and 2 (S) unless your opponent chooses and destroys 1 of his units.

combatText.title: RAIN OF CRUELTY
combatText.general: Move either 1 Ravager or 1 of your ships from an area in either the active system or an adjacent system to this area. If you do, gain 2 [D].
combatText.unit: Ravager: Place 1 free reinforcement token in this area. *newline* Force your opponent to lose 1 [S]. *newpara* Dying Sun: Gain 2 (B).

combatText.title: MALICIOUS FRENZY
combatText.general: Gain 2 (B), 2 (S), or spend 1 of your dice to gain 2 (B) and 2 (S).
combatText.unit: Ravager/Dying Sun: Force your opponent to lose 1 [B], 1 [S], and 1 [M].
